overview:
Stephen is a career technologist with a passion for online marketing strategies, web development and the internet in general.

He has over twenty years experience in business information technology, including stints at global software leader SAP (SAP AG-NYSE) and Sperry Univac (Unisys UIS-NYSE).

He’s built a small web business focused on the development and marketing of commercial websites and the integration of ecommerce applications into back end logistics and accounting systems.

As an applications consultant for SAP, he led project teams in the implementation of SAP R/3 software for several Fortune 500 clients, including Weyerhaeuser (WA), Allison Transmissions (IN), Karl Storz Endoscopy-America (Culver City, CA), Georg Fischer Systems (Irvine, CA) and others.

Kane was a solutions architect for topLingo Development in Irvine, California from February of 2008 to March 2009.
